about_the_game:
In the city of Otnorot, a horrific sinkhole has appeared, destroying a part of the town. Follow Conner and Tallulah and see if they survive the destruction.

Features:


    - A story about love, friendship, and the mystery of the sinkhole.
    - Sideview turn based battles
    - Overworld enemies (no random encounters)
    - Never get lost and know where to go with the objective system.
    - A game created by one person, Wallace Lovecraft.
    - Keyboard, mouse, xbox 360 controller , and keybinding support.
    - Approximately 3 hours to complete.
